website_summaries.verdict: Provides plenty of flexibility in its autofocus modes, creating success in many situations.
pros: Excellent design in a mirrorless digital camera
Achieves extremely fast autofocus performance, which ensures you'll have sharp images, even with fast-moving objects
Very good image quality, similar to what you receive with DSLR cameras

website_summaries.verdict: An advanced compact for wide-angle and manual-photography fans, the Fujifilm X100F improves upon an already great camera with better autofocus performance and a fine-tuned design on top of its already excellent photo quality.
pros: The Fujifilm X100F produces excellent photos and the updated autofocus system is a great improvement
Plus, it improves on the control layout and retains the manual-optimized shooting design and fast lens that have made it a favorite

customer_reviews.title: A new lease of life for my photography!
customer_reviews.text: Astonishing camera. Passionate hobbyist - started my camera life with a Nikon D60 and a couple of kit lenses, moved on to Nikon D800 and a couple of fantastic but heavy lenses. Two little children came along, and I felt that with my Nikon kit I was carrying a third child. Was not able to use my camera that much and really missing it. Bought this camera barely 3 months ago and it's like a new lease of life for my hobby. Extremely light , simply astonishing picture quality, the camera is very versatile and works well in poor light also. The controls are intuitive, the body and texture of the camera is simply gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera. I also have a DSLR and wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera. I also have a DSLR and wanted something smaller for travel and more of a street shooter. I am amazed at the ease of use, manual controls and quality of the pics. Low light is incredible, usable at 12800 ISO. Film simulations are fantastic. Highly recommend, in spite of the high cost.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Pascale

customer_reviews.title: Best camera we have owned in the last 5 years ...
customer_reviews.text: Best camera we have owned in the last 5 years hands down. Takes fantastic photos in all types of conditions. The results are fantastic. Very quality build. Believe all the other positive reviews and what the critics say. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: ZDM

customer_reviews.title: This camera takes beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes beautiful pictures. Jpgs look great straight from the camera. Low light pictures look great. I wish this quality was available in a phone. The only downside is that a phone is more convenient, and you have to haul this rather heavy camera with you. Ricoh GR III has a more convenient form factor than this camera. However, Ricoh GR III pictures suck compared to this Fuji x100F (I extensively tried both side by side for several weeks). This camera punches also well above it's weight, see reviews on YouTube comparing it to cameras 3 to 5 times it's price. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Images comparable to the Leica Q I rented, but 1/3 the cot. Many features that I am still learning.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Nourse

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gets better.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the original X100, X100T and now this. Each time they get better. The addition of the joystick focus selector is well worth the upgrade alone. Also if you use the Fuji adapter lenses (I use the tele), the version 2 of those lens adapters now automatically sets the camera to the correct conversion lens via a hidden sensor. As always, the Fuji X Series camera images are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: First off, it's a very pretty camera.
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of DSLR's because of their sizes, so I made the switch to this, which I've found recommendations again and again. It was pricey, but it was probably the best investment I've made in a long time, especially for my street photography hobby and traveling habits. I love being able to take photos on the street without making people feel uncomfortable like they're being spied on. Plus, basic settings, including ISO, shutter speed, and f-stop functions are analog, so making adjustments is super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Ho

customer_reviews.title: Truly Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the S to the F and am so pleased I did and I'm admittedly a fan of the F100 series. This camera is so small and inconspicuous yet produces photos easily equivalent to monstrous gear setups. This is the only camera i use now. The photos are unbelievable and it is so stylish and retro looking. I love it. You can control apeture, speed, ISO with the quick twist of traditional dials. These physical dials are so much faster than squinting into a screen and pushing buttons while your photo opportunity passes before your very eyes. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Spengler

customer_reviews.title: This is a camera you have to get to know, I almost sent it back.
customer_reviews.text: I use my Nikon gear for a shoot, still love it, but this little camera grows on you if you take the time to learn how to use it. The lens is sharp, great color reproduction, and it's something you can grab for walking around town without a dslr hanging from your neck. I find the build quality to be excellent, it just feels solid. I probably shouldn't have knocked off a star because it's not the cameras fault, but in post with it I cannot seem to get fuji's raw files to work in lightroom.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results straight from the camera. Previous camera used Canon 6d w/ Canon 35 1.4 and 85 1.8
customer_reviews.text: I am an amateur photographer. Until this purchase, my main camera has been a Canon 6d. I typically use either the Canon 35 1.4 or 85 1.8 and have been very pleased with the results. I was recently fortunate enough to be able to get my hands on the Fuji x100f. 1) I have made hundreds of Amazon purchases and have maybe left 5 reviews in my life. 2) I purchased this with high expectations and a week in I am blown away. Amazing results straight from the camera. I also haven't found the menu system nearly as clunky as some reviews describe. I will update if anything changes. 5 out of 5 without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: TheLoinGirder

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: So i held off buying a camera since i recently purchased an iphone xs. I splurged with the excuse of the better camera thinking I could go without another device. When i received this for my birthday, I was ecstatic! I've always loved fuji and this had so many great reviews. Wish the wifi connectivity to the phone was easier (should just be a button on the back) but really, that's my only con. in love with this camera
customer_reviews.author: Abe Kim

customer_reviews.title: The rangefinder you always wanted is here.  What a great camera.
customer_reviews.text: THE best digital rangefinder camera you'll likely find- rave reviews online are spot on. In a world of smartphone photography or if you're used to DSLR shooting you'll have to do some learning. Its really easy to get somewhat dreamy/soft photos if you try to shoot normally with this- learn your camera and you'll get the best color or black and white images possible. This is built solidly and it has heft- all aspects of the unit are top shelf. If you have older X100 type cams this is definitely an upgrade from them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: better control layout
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from my X100T. Faster focusing, better control layout. Excellent camera for street photography. Much faster shutter response than X100T.
customer_reviews.author: gary gruber

customer_reviews.title: You need this camera in your life
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this camera. This is not a point and shoot, this camera is special. Shoots completely silent, the output is incredible and the leaf shutter...oh my goodness, amazing! I own many Nikon pro dslr’s, the X-T3 and the X-H1, yet, when I just want to relax and take great photos, this is the camera I choose every time. The VERY sharp 23mm fixed lens challenges my creativity, which is one of the reasons that I love it so much! Oh, and did I mention that this well built body is made in Japan?!
customer_reviews.author: luvgshepherds

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Coming from Nikon i was hesitant to transition to something new but i was tired of lugging around my lenses and all the other accessories you accumulate. This fixed lens camera produces excellent images and i love the film simulations but most of all i love the simplicity of this machine, sexy looks, and new found creativity this camera provides that my Nikon never did. Fuji has a new fan. Move your feet...its okay :)
customer_reviews.author: G. DeGuzman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: I have owned its older brother the X100 since they came out 6 years ago. There is indeed a new learning curve with this latest version as I never lived through the S or T versions. Check your firmware as it is now 2.1. Watch where your Amazon 3d party seller is located as sales tax add up to over $100 on top of this,and stay away from Abe's of Maine. They are not the same company anymore and sell opened and or non-warranted cameras sometimes. Hence their lower advertised pricing. Always check to see if the blue label is attached to the plastic bag containing the camera and check serial# to that printed on the box! Caveat emptor!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Bates

customer_reviews.title: It's great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera. It's kind of complicated to understand what every button does, but once you got it, it gets easier every time. I had to download the manual in my cellphone to check it every time I'm in doubt. It can transfer pictures via wifi if they are jpeg format only, raw can't. I bought this camera "used" with the label "like new" and it wasn't wrong. Literally the shutter count was 0! Just the box was already open but all accessories were in their individual never opened package.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Mtz

customer_reviews.title: OMG THE BEST THING EVER - IT'S REPLACED MY DSLR!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera to take traveling since a DSLR screams, "TOURIST!" and can be a burden when walking long distances. After making this purchase, I have barely touched my DSLR. My X100F goes everywhere with me and super easy to just pull out and snap. Best purchase for my photography! You won't ragrat!
customer_reviews.author: Tine

customer_reviews.title: is the best camera ever
customer_reviews.text: is the best camera ever. there are plenty of deep dive reviews. just wanted to say that coming from leica d luz typ 109 this is a great compact and carry around camera. do not hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade from earlier X100 models.
customer_reviews.text: If you're into travel and/or street photography, you already know that you want this camera. Leaf shutter. Gorgeous colors. Built-in ND filter. AF quick AF. High-res RAW files with plenty of room for cropping, or shoot JPEG with film simulations and never open the Lightroom 'Develop' panel again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Best Compact Fixed Lens Camera Out There
customer_reviews.text: Completely amazing camera. If it were wearing a Leica logo the reviews would speak of a new dawn in compact camera photography. Significant upgrade from the X100S! I'll add more later...
customer_reviews.author: JMoJo

customer_reviews.title: This camera understands what the soul of photography is.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a lot of cameras, and the X100F is among the best I’ve owned. Excellent build quality and lens. Beautiful pictures. I like all the menu choices, shortcuts, user control and creative options available. This is not a camera for newbies, or those who simply want to shoot everything in Auto mode. This is a camera that makes you want to pick it up, take it with you everywhere, and start shooting pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrus

customer_reviews.title: Best x100 yet, duh.
customer_reviews.text: I owned the original, which I loved despite its quirky firmware. So it's no surprise that 3 generations later they've improved a few things. Wifi, USB charging, menu and button customization and more buttons! But what I love most of all is just how fun it is to shoot with this camera. This is my desert island camera. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Meissner

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I have ever used. I carried it with me during my travels to Asia and it helped me capture the most important moments of the trip without fail. I found the wifi remote control from my phone to be very useful, especially during get-togethers with friends and family. The portability + quality factor cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn V

customer_reviews.title: Still a solid camera in 2019!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for a few days and I have to say this camera is incredible. I have a Canon 5D IV. I wanted a camera that is compact and simple. This is just that! It encourages me to go back to the basics and really pay attention to what I'm photographing. Especially with the fixed lens. Perfect for street photography or just your everyday camera. The build quality is on point, so having it on you every day, you know it's going to take a beating. I love this camera. Bought this camera "Like new" from Amazon wearhouse. Plus an additional 20% off from prime day. Buy this camera used, and it's definitely worth it in 2019!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sayno

customer_reviews.title: Made me fall back in love with photography
customer_reviews.text: The X100F is perfect for travelling, street photography, and general walkaround every-day situations. It’s the camera I bring along when I need a happy medium between my 6D and my iPhone. It’s perfect, does everything I need, gives me raw and lovely film emulation. It has brought the simple joys of photography back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my Fujifilm X100F. The image quality is stunning and I'm really impressed with how sturdy and compact it is. The number of controls available are also amazing compared to all of my Nikon DSLRs.
customer_reviews.author: djhart

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already
customer_reviews.text: If you're here then you have researched it already. Its everything that people say it is and more. Stop reading reviews and just buy it! If you have bigger hands then buy the extra grip. Its less than 100 and is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: The Only Camera You Need! Instagram: thedharmalife
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a using Fujifilms X100S, X100T then moving to the XT series including the recent XT2 I forget how small this camera is. It's a close race between this and the XT2 but I have to say his is my favorite digital camera of all time. It goes with me everywhere. And it's the only camera I now shoot with other than my iPhone. You can see what shooting with a 23mm (35mm equivalent) fujinon/fujifilm lens can do. Check out my instagram page for pictures. Instagram: thedharmalife
customer_reviews.author: one world travel

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just spectacular. Perfect size and weight and the viewfinder is awesome. Acros film simulation and the 24MP sensor with this lens is a killer black and white setup. I have been shooting with an X70 while waiting for the arrival so the controls feel quite natural. The only this I miss it atilt screen.
customer_reviews.author: VinnyTheIcepick

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a compact digital that looks like film in the very best way
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality of this camera is a bit magic. If you're looking for a compact digital that looks like film in the very best way...this is it. It does not do everything well, if you're looking for super saturated very colorful output for something like food photography you may want to turn elsewhere. If you're looking for amazing skin tones, shadow detail, crisp details, low light shooting...black and white under Leica prices this will likely be your camera. After a few weeks of shooting, finding your settings and getting used to it...it's hard not to have a bit of love for this camera.
customer_reviews.author: savage

customer_reviews.title: Amazed
customer_reviews.text: Consistently amazed at what this camera can do. Ended up keeping my 5D Mark IV in my bag for my most recent shoot and had no regrets. It's true what they say - this camera makes photography a joy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: It is a fantastic camera and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I read every review I could find before I made this investment. It is a fantastic camera and I love it. I don’t like lugging around a DSLR and this is the perfect solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jpuscas

customer_reviews.title: A GEM
customer_reviews.text: this little guy is amazing, perfect size to carry with you every day, photo quality is top notch. I have a bigger camera for important projects but this is my everyday camera and I never leave my home without it!
customer_reviews.author: V. Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Poor man's leica
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera because its so simple yet produces great pictures. Small and easy to carry around so you can take it everywhere. The settings are easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: don quijote

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product maybe the newer one is updated and working better
customer_reviews.text: I tried one it had problems with the screen and the other maybe I got a bad one but it did not took sharp enough pictures was always blurred out of focus
customer_reviews.author: Joel L.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this camera. It and the TCL cover my still photography needs. I have a Panasonic camera that I use for video, but this is my go to for photography now. Fills my need to go with a more manual style of shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Street Photography and surprisingly a great portrait camera too.
customer_reviews.text: I have an XT 20 and use this mainly for street. The only criticism I have is the same as the XT 20. The memory card shares the same bay as the battery. Otherwise I love Fuji quality cameras as well as their glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-er

customer_reviews.title: travel camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for travel - Although the Fuji sensor is only an APSC sensor, the lens is excellent - post edit & crop can result in great photos - just take a couple of months to learn the menu & therefore the tricks of the trade.
customer_reviews.author: tony scully

customer_reviews.title: CHECK SHUTTER COUNT!!!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING*** CHECK THE SHUTTER COUNT WHEN YOU BUY NEW!! AMAZON SOLD ME A USED CAMERA AS A NEW CAMERA. Shutter count had over 17,000 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the very best point and shoots out there
customer_reviews.text: I’m deeply impressed by this little camera. The images are not only sharp but they also have a soulful quality which I find endearing.
customer_reviews.author: Aetoss

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never regretted a purchase less.
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel photography and those everyday memories. Sure, for weddings and studio portraits you can do a lot better. However, I’ve found some of the most important moments happen during the in-between times and the Fuji-X100 series is the perfect tool to capture those nostalgic future memories for your life's B-roll. Like the top reviewer says - “Soul in a box”.
customer_reviews.author: YourFriendAaron

customer_reviews.title: Mine has a squishy screen problem
customer_reviews.text: The LCD screen is not firm, especially when you touch it in the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Cost to Upgrade From the Original
customer_reviews.text: A significant upgrade over the original, well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: VertigoPilot

customer_reviews.title: Great mirrorless digital option!
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday carry camera with exceptionally brilliant pictures. I am still learning all the features but so far, excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: BadgerDan

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 18 months and 2,000 shots
customer_reviews.text: Product failed 18 months and 2000 shots in. Get the warranty or buy used.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Best Street Photography Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Best travel friendly, street photography camera. This camera and fixed-lens is best used (in my opinion) for street photography or travel / documentary style photography - that’s when it excels the most and it’s absolutely must if you prefer these styles of shooting!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, small enough to take anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera for 8 months and love using it. The image quality is excellent and it is small enough to take anywhere. I also like having the option of using the screen or viewfinder
customer_reviews.author: Steven L Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. A bit complex, but something to keep me busy.
customer_reviews.author: Think-Brand

customer_reviews.title: a thing of beauty is a joy forever
customer_reviews.text: takes me back to the GOOD OLE DAYS OF FILM. just got it, and love it. more to come!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: awesome JPEGs out of the camera
customer_reviews.text: Legendary style, fast AF in most light situation, awesome JPEGs out of the camera. You cannot go wrong with this gem. The only question one may ask: should you get the silver or black version. Silver is more classy and reminiscent of film camera, it will actually attract more attention (positive one from the subjects you are shooting) and is not as stealthy as the black one. I got the black one
customer_reviews.author: Fujizilla

customer_reviews.title: Look no further...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my favorite camera. This is based on three months of continuous shooting. Great tool, and great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is may fave to use, you can't change out the lens so you have to problem solve to get the shot you want (its a different way of thinking) I love the feature and the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Millard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, not good for action and fast moving photography. But excellent for scenery and product photos
customer_reviews.author: HONESTBUYER

customer_reviews.title: A great SLR replacement
customer_reviews.text: We had an large SLR with several lens, but we realized that the camera was taking up 50% of our luggage and was a real hassle when traveling. This was a perfect fit. Great photos for people and scenery and I haven't noticed any loss with the fixed lens.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, with great button layout. On top of the great image quality, it's sexy as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse C.

customer_reviews.title: Great camara
customer_reviews.text: I brought the used one, it said 90%new but it came like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appearance
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not as good as Ricoh gr, at least I think so, the filter effect is too common.
customer_reviews.author: LUCAS

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and easy to use controls. Takes excellent photos.
customer_reviews.author: Oldawg47

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.  Buy the genuine Fugifilm case, it's tough and well made.
customer_reviews.text: So far, it is a good replacement for my old X-10.
customer_reviews.author: B. E. Sharrow

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Warehouse Fujifilm x100f
customer_reviews.text: A day early. Low shutter count. Great shape. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanb

customer_reviews.title: New to photography
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I’m a novice, just trying to learn something new.
customer_reviews.author: Rahim basit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: After a year of ownership I can say that I love this camera. I found carrying around a bulky DSLR cumbersome and realized that I was more often that not leaving the camera at home and missing out on some really great photo opportunities. This camera is small enough that it is not a burden and always comes along on travel and events. If you can handle not having zoom, which works for me since I'm mostly doing portraiture and architecture, then the other features and quality of image will not let you down. Definitely get much better pictures with this than my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box it is pretty intuitive to use and I was able to start ...
customer_reviews.text: Top-notch construction and it takes superb pictures. There are so many features that it will take some time to learn them all, but it is very versatile. Out of the box it is pretty intuitive to use and I was able to start taking pictures using the factory defaults within ten minutes. Initially, all I read was the quick reference guide. All-in-all, I wouldn't trade it for anyhing. I'm as happy as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Cici Ciconia

customer_reviews.title: Will change how you take photos
customer_reviews.text: Buying this camera changed my life. It's not only a means to capture an image but a tool which caused me to approach photography from new angles and fall back in love with the process and the craft.
customer_reviews.author: otisia

customer_reviews.title: Solid camera, noticeable barrel distortion
customer_reviews.text: Heard only great things about this camera and I’m a huge fan of Fujifilm, but the camera I got had pretty annoying barrel distortion (I made sure the conversion lens settings were off). It would have been easily fixable in Lightroom but it’s something that would’ve bothered me while shooting. Was also a little too small for my hands. I’ll stick with the X Pro 2.
customer_reviews.author: Isadore Branch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera and So Much Fun
customer_reviews.text: The Fujifilm X100F is my third Fujifilm camera. It is both a highly capable photographic tool and a fun camera to use. It is small enough to take anywhere and yields far better photos than my iPhone 7 Plus. Also, for JPEG shooters, the well documented quality of Fujifilm's film simulations means you will get SOOC photos that will make you smile! The ACROS black and white simulation is my favorite. You will want to add a thumb grip to this little camera. The placement of the "Q" button is not best and I would often hit it accidentally. With the thumb grip this is no longer a problem. Great camera...HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Lysander Spooner

customer_reviews.title: So glad I finally committed to purchasing this camera
customer_reviews.text: So glad I finally committed to purchasing this camera. Small but mighty. Beautiful colors as fujifilm are known for. I keep it on me almost always. Perfect for street photography and capturing my kids out and about. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Bahagirl

customer_reviews.title: ... my 3rd Fuji x100 and this one does not disappoint. I love this compact powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Fuji x100 and this one does not disappoint. I love this compact powerhouse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great camera ... it lives with me
customer_reviews.text: image quality is excellent , portability very good, battery life....not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lianza

customer_reviews.title: I gave the camera 5 stars because it’s in great shape. Everything works great and I can’t wait ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave the camera 5 stars because it’s in great shape. Everything works great and I can’t wait to start my photo journey with this camera. My only concern was that this was listed as and open box item, meaning it would come with everything and it did not. I was missing the Triangles for the strap and a tool that helps affix the triangles to the eyelets of the camera. All in all great camera and great purchase from a good seller. The camera is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Khalid Aziz

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I can't express how much I love this camera! Its so compact and the picture qualities are just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the x100f  but not the fixed lens
customer_reviews.text: The x100f is an awesome powerful camera after using it I realized I cant live with a fixed lens but if you can live with that the camera is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tom frasca

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little camera that'll only get better with more firmware updates
customer_reviews.text: Nifty little camera that'll only get better with more firmware updates. Pro-tip: Shoot in RAW and set the control ring to Digital Teleconverter to disable the control ring so you don't accidentally change it to Sepia when adjusting the aperture. Can we please use the LCD for the menus in viewfinder + eye sensor mode??
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera that is worth the crazy price tag, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: I love the feel of this camera in my hands
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this camera in my hands. It is beautifully made. I sometimes hit buttons I don't mean to and this is a little frustrating, however you can set the one button that I constantly hit to a locked position. Once I do that, I will love it!.. There is a lot of features to this camera so be patient and enjoy as you learn!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Beeckman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera (compared to my Nikon) with impressive features and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Sheasby

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 3 stars for the service, not the camera(on this feedback). The seller should have advised me that the warranty doesn't cover outside the USA then I can decide if I wanna purchase. So after 3 months of use, my camera menu buttons are not functioning so I have to pay for the service fee and rear FPC assy with Fujifilm Studio Singapore. I do hope I won't have any more problem cus my brand new camera does not have any warranty in Singapore!
customer_reviews.author: Serene

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera but doesn't really suit my style of shooting. Best for street photography I think.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Happiness, pure and simple.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous object. We have become inseparable. For good measure, be ready to spend hours with the instruction manual as well, if you really want to discover all the beautiful things you can do with this camera. Lots of information there.
customer_reviews.author: Z4ikh&&^0

customer_reviews.title: Quality very poor.  My cellphone s9+ is much better.
customer_reviews.text: It is very happy for small camera that I used to have with the same size. Also, the most importance for me is quality, but it is very poor for the camera price i paid was over $1,199.00. My Samsung Galaxy S9+ cellphone picture quality is much better. I am not recommend any to buy this camera. Buy Samsung Galaxy S9+ for more value
customer_reviews.author: Lam k. Tran

customer_reviews.title: X100F - Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt be happier. This next iteration of camera is without a doubt, the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dana D.

customer_reviews.title: Item is defective. Have contacted Fujifilm Tech Support who ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is defective. Have contacted Fujifilm Tech Support who confirmed there is an issue with the camera that I received. There is flickering in both the LCD screen and EVF when pressing and holding the shutter button. Item has been returned to Amazon for a refund. This product was via Ritz Camera. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent A. Provenzano

customer_reviews.title: What a complicated litter thing
customer_reviews.text: I did return the next day. What a complicated little thing! I bought the Canon 6D Mark II and I absolutely love this camera, much more than my Canon 5DSR. Who can live without Wi-Fi and articulated LCD after knowing? Not me!
customer_reviews.author: Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera with top notch image quality. Seller shipped very quickly. The camera was overpriced when I bought it because there were so few silver versions at the time (so minus one star), but the seller provided good service.
customer_reviews.author: HolyCow

customer_reviews.title: The flash has never worked
customer_reviews.text: The flash has never worked. International garantee does not incluide shipping to return the product (shipping from Perú is about USD 350). Bad experience!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Size and handleability are issues to consider
customer_reviews.text: Small viewfinder is difficult to use when wearing glasses or sunglasses. Camera is small all around, with lots of tiny fiddly buttons and controls, and no good way to grab hold of it. Focus misses some of the time. Pictures are very sharp when in focus.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered silver but I received a black one. I didn't have enough time to change it. It's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fujifilm X100F 24.3 MP APS-C Digital Camera-Silver
product_meta.description: Style:Base| Color:SilverThe Fujifilm x100f is the latest premium compact digital camera to join the x series family. It is the ultimate in premium compact digital camera, equipped with the advanced hybrid viewfinder of enhanced convenience. While maintaining the elegant design and same 23mmf2 focal length that has proven to be popular, the new camera has been developed in pursuit for easy operability, reflecting requests from users of previous models.
feature_bullets: 24.3MP X Trans CMOS III APS C sensor with no low pass filter and X Processor Pro
8 way focus lever plus the number of focusing points has been expanded from 49 in previous models to 91 (up to 325 points)

Built in ISO dial, incorporated into the shutter speed dial and operating temperature is 0 degree Celsius to 40 degree Celsius (+32 degree Fahrenheit to +104 degree Fahrenheit); Operating Humidity: 10 to 80 percent (no condensation)
AF mode(single / Zone / wide tracking). Hot shoe: Dedicated TTL Flash compatible. Exposure control: TTL 256 zone metering, Multi / Spot / Average / Center Weighted
New np w126s lithium battery; Focus distance Approx. 10 centimeter Infinity / 3.9 Inches Infinity

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars281 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
